ygData.subject: Can't escape
ygData.msgSnippet: So I get fed up with EQ this weekend and decide to head out to actually spend time with my wife by doing the old dinner and a movie routine.  We decide to see
ygData.messageBody:
So I get fed up with EQ this weekend and decide to head out to actually
spend time with my wife by doing the old dinner and a movie routine. We
decide to see U-541 (or whatever it's called). The lights go down and I
am wrapping up a quiet conversation before the previews begin when my
wife suddenly starts hissing and throwing popcorn at the screen. I turn
to find the overly familier gold font of "EVERQUEST" smack dab in the
middle of the screen in 5 foot high letters. This game is stalking me.

Movie was ok, btw. No real treat.

-Brad

Got my Kunark today!
